name: werx/core
description: Front controller and other core libraries used by the Werx project.

suggest.zendframewark/zend-diactoros: For a full implementation of the Psr7 http-message specification
suggest.guzzlehttp/psr7: An alternate (currently less complete) implementation of the Psr7 http-message specification
suggest.aura/router: (~2.0) To use the built in Aura Routes middleware
suggest.illuminate/database: (~5.0.0) To use the builtin in database middleware
suggest.willdurand/negotiation: To use the builtin Rest API middleware
